title: iOS Developer
jobDescription:
Role: Software Engineer iOS Dev

Location: Hyderabad

About the Role:

We are seeking an experienced iOS SDK Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Swift and Objective-C, with extensive experience in developing, deploying, and maintaining SDKs for iOS applications. The role demands a deep understanding of RESTful APIs, push notifications, and performance tuning to ensure optimal SDK performance. Familiarity with various architectures, Apple standards, and security essentials are crucial.

What Youll be Responsible For?

  • Design, develop, and maintain iOS SDKs and libraries.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of SDKs.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
  • Work with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.
  • Implement and maintain push notification services.
  • Conduct performance tuning and optimization of the SDK.
  • Adhere to Apples design principles and interface guidelines.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers.
  • Write and maintain comprehensive documentation for the SDK.
  • Ensure the implementation of security best practices in all aspects of the SDK development process.

What You’d have ?

  • B.Tech / BE / M.Tech in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 4-7 years of professional experience in iOS development.
  • Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C.
  • Proven experience in developing iOS SDKs and libraries.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and how to integrate them into iOS applications.
  • Experience with push notification services.
  • In-depth knowledge of various architectural patterns (MVC, MVVM, etc.) and best practices.
  • Familiarity with Apple’s Human Interface Guidelines and App Store Review Guidelines.
  • Proficient understanding of version control systems, such as Git.
  • Experience with performance and memory tuning using tools (such as Instruments) and techniques.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Good knowledge of the iOS environment.
  • Awareness of iOS security essentials and best practices, including encryption, secure storage, and data protection.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and tools.
  • Experience with test-driven development and automated testing frameworks.
  • Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
  • Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team environment.
  • Experience with analytics and tracking SDKs.
  • Understanding of secure coding practices and experience with security tools and frameworks.

Why join us?

  • Impactful Work: Play a pivotal role in safeguarding Tanla's assets, data, and reputation in the industry.
  • Tremendous Growth Opportunities: Be part of a rapidly growing company in the telecom and CPaaS space, with opportunities for professional development.
  • Innovative Environment: Work alongside a world-class team in a challenging and fun environment, where innovation is celebrated.

Tanla is an equal opportunity employer. We champion diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

www.tanla.com

title: Branch Sales Manager
tagsAndSkills: Client Acquisition,Branch Sales,Branch Handling,Team Handling,Sales manager,Direct Sales,Client Relationship Management,Area sales
jobDescription:
As a Branch Sales Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth and expanding our market presence within your designated region. Leveraging your strategic acumen and sales expertise, you will lead a team of sales professionals to achieve sales targets, acquire new clients, and foster long-term relationships with existing customers. Your primary focus will be on driving subscription sales and ensuring customer satisfaction through personalized solutions and exceptional service delivery.


Responsibilities:

  1. Sales Strategy Development: Collaborate with the executive team to develop and implement effective sales strategies aligned with company objectives and market trends.
  2. Team Leadership: Recruit, train, and mentor a high-performing sales team, providing guidance, support, and ongoing coaching to maximize individual and collective performance.
  3. Revenue Generation: Drive revenue growth by identifying new business opportunities, cultivating leads, and closing sales deals with prospective clients.
  4. Market Analysis: Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify industry trends, customer preferences, and growth opportunities, utilizing insights to refine sales strategies and product offerings.
  5. Performance Monitoring: Track sales metrics, analyze performance data, and prepare regular reports to assess sales performance, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions to optimize sales effectiveness.
  6. Collaboration: Collaborate cross-functionally with marketing, product development, and customer support teams to ensure seamless coordination and alignment of efforts to drive business growth and enhance customer experience.
  7. Compliance: Ensure adherence to company policies, sales procedures, and regulatory requirements, maintaining high standards of ethics and professionalism in all business interactions.

Qualifications:

  • Any graduation, and MBA/PGDM preferred.
  • Proven track record of success in B2B sales, with a minimum of 3 years of experience in sales leadership roles.
  • Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and inspire a sales team to achieve targets and exceed expectations.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and credibility with clients at all levels.
  • Strategic thinker with a results-oriented mindset and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
  • Deep understanding of B2B sales processes, market dynamics, and customer relationship management.
  • Willingness to travel as needed within the assigned region.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary package with performance-based incentives.
  • Comprehensive health benefits package.
  • Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.
  • Dynamic and collaborative work environment.
  • Work-life balance initiatives.

Join our dynamic team and be part of a company that is revolutionizing the way businesses operate in the digital era. If you are passionate about driving sales excellence and delivering exceptional value to clients, we want to hear from you! Apply now and take the next step in your career journey with IndiaMART.
